Package space.sunqian.fs.object.convert

package space.sunqian.fs.object.convert
Package for object conversion and data mapping.

Supports copying object properties, including instances of Map and non-map objects, using codes similar to the following: 


 DataMapper dataMapper = DataMapper.defaultMapper();
 dataMapper.copyProperties(src, dst, options);
The core interface for data mapping:
  • DataMapper

Supports object type conversion, using codes similar to the following: 


 ObjectConverter converter = ObjectConverter.defaultConverter();
 converter.convert(src, target, options);
The core interface for object type conversion:
  • ObjectConverter

Other interfaces and classes:

  • ConvertOption
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    space.sunqian.fs.object
    This package and its subpackages provide various object related operations; space.sunqian.fs.object.data: Parses and manipulates objects as data entities; space.sunqian.fs.object.convert: Converts objects into different types;
    space.sunqian.fs.object.convert.handlers
     
    space.sunqian.fs.object.data
    Package for data object.
  • Class
    Description
    ConvertOption
    Option for object conversion and data mapping.
    DataMapper
    This interface is used to map data properties from an object to another object.
    DataMapper.ExceptionHandler
    Exception handler for copying object property, used to handle exceptions thrown when copying a property.
    DataMapper.PropertyMapper
    Property mapper for copying object property, this interface is called when copying each property.
    DataMapper.SchemaCache
    Cache for DataSchemas parsed during the mapping process.
    ObjectConverter
    This interface is used to convert an object from the specified type to the target type.
    ObjectConverter.Handler
    Handler for ObjectConverter, provides the specific conversion logic.
    ObjectConverter.Status
    Represents the status of conversion.
    ObjectConvertException
    Exception for object conversion.
    UnsupportedObjectConvertException
    This exception is thrown when an object conversion is unsupported.
